help.desc: Get informations about a command. You can enter app name after help command (php core/manager help app-manager)

cache-manager.desc:
Manage iumio cache  
        --clear : Clear cache environment (Dev environment as default)  
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, PREPROD, ALL) (must used with --clear)

assets-manager.desc:
Manage project assets 
        --copy : Copy project assets to web directory  
        --symlink (must with --copy option) Symbolic link will be created 
        --clear : clear all web assets 
        --appname : App name 'Example --appname=DefaultApp' (must be use with --copy or --clear option

app-manager.desc:
Manage project 
        new-project : Create project  
        switch-project : Change the default project 
        remove-project : Remove a project
